testcase.name: login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser......................................................passed And Enter the URL "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"...................passed When Click on My Account Menu...............................................passed And Enter registered username in username textbox...........................passed And Enter password in password textbox......................................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then User must successfully login to the web page...........................passed

testcase.name: login is incorrect username and password
testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser......................................................passed And Enter the URL "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"...................passed When Click on My Account Menu...............................................passed And Enter incorrect username in username textbox............................passed And Enter incorrect password in password textbox............................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then Proper error must be displayed(ie Invalid username) and prompt to enter login again.passed
